#How to provide log to the devs

== Install a Logcat app ==

 * Install "Quick System info" from the market
 * Open the app
 * Click the process page
 * return to home

== Perform actions in Synodroid ==

 * Open synodroid
 * Got to parameters
 * Turn on debugging logs
 * Perform actions that you want to log
 * Return to home

== Dump logcat == 

 * Open Quick system info
 * Long press the synodroid process
 * press the show log button
 * press menu and send the logs to synodroid devs
